methods.name: get_intrinsic_size
methods.summary: Get the intrinsic size of a plot, if known.
methods.description: The intrinsic size of a plot is the size at which a plot would be if no size constraints were applied by Positron.

schema.name: intrinsic_size
schema.description: The intrinsic size of a plot, if known

unit.description: The unit of measurement of the plot's dimensions

source.description: The source of the intrinsic size e.g. 'Matplotlib'

methods.name: render
methods.description: Requests a plot to be rendered. The plot data is returned in a base64-encoded string.

params.name: size
params.description: The requested size of the plot. If not provided, the plot will be rendered at its intrinsic size.

params.name: pixel_ratio
params.description: The pixel ratio of the display device

data.description: The plot data, as a base64-encoded string

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the plot data

plot_unit.description: The unit of measurement of a plot's dimensions
